survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personal Finance Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered personal finance assistants to understand their satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal finance assistant?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users based on engagement frequency. Consider adding a follow-up question for first-time users to understand their initial experience.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal finance assistant?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered personal finance assistant do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to prioritize feature development. Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered personal finance assistant do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the financial advice provided by the AI assistant?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to gauge satisfaction with AI accuracy. Consider benchmarking against industry standards.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the financial advice provided by the AI assistant?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered personal finance assistant?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying unmet needs or pain points.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered personal finance assistant?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this AI-powered personal finance assistant to others?
questions.client_notes: Measures Net Promoter Score (NPS). Responses can be categorized into promoters, passives, and detractors.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this AI-powered personal finance assistant to others?
